Bio

I'm a BS/MS candidate studying math and computer science at Stanford University. My primary interests are in AI, NLP, data, and ML infrastructure. Exploring engineering and product management opportunities in all of the above areas - if you'd be open to chatting, reach out to me on LinkedIn or at andukuri@stanford.edu.

Creative Lyrics with Transformer-Based Reinforcement Learning (In Progress) GitHub PDF

Using reward- and creative token- based learning to produce more creative, coherent song lyrics.

Chinmaya Andukuri, Niral Patel (Stanford CS230, Spring '23)

Twitter/Reddit Financial Sentiment with Deep Learning GitHub

Stock price prediction and paper trading with vanilla and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) on Twitter and Reddit sentiment.

Chinmaya Andukuri, Shobha Dasari, Eden Wang (Stanford CS224N, Winter '23)

IMDB Sentiment Analysis GitHub

Exploring basic classifiers used for sentiment analysis using a dataset of 50,000 movie reviews from IMDB.

Chinmaya Andukuri

Spotify Wrapp(ing) GitHub

Uses the Spotify API to access a user's listening history and create an in-progress version of Spotify Wrapped's results.

Chinmaya Andukuri
